greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Initial members of triples listed in A144625.
maple: for k from 0 to n do for j from 0 to n do for i from 0 to n do if i+j+k=n then lprint(i,j,k); fi;
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 18 2009
